00024   ## \brief Sets the verbosity level of the model
00025   # \param value True shows progress of timesteps, False no output
00026   def setQuiet(self, value):
00027     assert type(value) == types.BooleanType
00028     self.silentModelOuput = value
00029 
00030   def _silentModelOuput(self):
00031     return self.silentModelOuput

00033   ## \brief Returns a list of time steps configured.
00034   def timeSteps(self):
00035     """
00036     Returns a list of time steps configured
00037     """
00038     return range(self.firstTimeStep(), self.nrTimeSteps() + 1)
00039 
00040   ## \brief Returns the number of time steps configured.
00041   #
00042   # \return 0 for static models, number of time steps otherwise
00043   def nrTimeSteps(self):
00044     assert self._d_nrTimeSteps
00045     return self._d_nrTimeSteps
00046 
00047 
00048   ## \brief Returns the current time step.
00049   #
00050   # \return 0 for static models, current time step in range from 1 to
00051   # nrTimeSteps() otherwise
00052   def currentTimeStep(self):
00053     assert self.currentStep >= 0
00054     return self.currentStep
00055 
00056   ## \brief returns first timestep of a model
00057   def firstTimeStep(self):
00058     assert self._d_firstTimeStep
00059     return self._d_firstTimeStep
00060 
00061

00063   ## \brief Storing map data to disk.
00064   #
00065   # \param variable object containing the PCRaster map data
00066   # \param name name used as filename. Use filename with less than eight characters
00067   # and without extension. File extension for dynamic models is ".map" in initial section
00068   # and the 8.3 style format name in the dynamic section.
00069   # File extensions will be appended automatically.
00070   def report(self, variable, name, style=1):
00071     self._reportNew(variable, name)
00072 
00073 
00074   ## \brief Reading map data from disk.
00075   #
00076   # \param name name used as filename. Use filename with less than eight characters
00077   # and without extension. File extension for dynamic models is ".map" in initial section
00078   # and the 8.3 style format name in the dynamic section.
00079   # File extensions will be appended automatically.
00080   def readmap(self, name, style=1):
00081     return self._readmapNew(name)
